parameters.name: CWL Document
parameters.description: path or URL to a CWL Workflow, CommandLineTool, or ExpressionTool. If the `inputs_object` has a `cwl:tool` field indicating the path or URL to the cwl_document, then the `workflow` argument is optional.

parameters.name: Inputs Object
parameters.description: path or URL to a CWL Workflow, CommandLineTool, or ExpressionTool. If the `inputs_object` has a `cwl:tool` field indicating the path or URL to the cwl_document, then the `workflow` argument is optional.

parameters.name: Cache Dir
parameters.description: Directory to cache intermediate workflow outputs to avoid recomputing steps.

parameters.name: Parallel
parameters.description: [experimental] Run jobs in parallel. Does not currently keep track of ResourceRequirements like the number of coresor memory and can overload this system

parameters.name: Preserve env variable
parameters.description: Preserve specific environment variable when running CommandLineTools. May be provided multiple times.

parameters.name: Preserve all env variable
parameters.description: Preserve all environment variable when running CommandLineTools.

parameters.name: Delete Docker container
parameters.description: Delete Docker container used by jobs after they exit (default)

parameters.name: Do not delete Docker
parameters.description: Do not delete Docker container used by jobs after they exit
